summary: The CARES Act requires us to monitor and oversee federal efforts to prepare for, respond to, and recover from the COVID-19 pandemic. We've issued five comprehensive reports with 44 recommendations to help improve the federal response. Our testimony summarizes the 16 of these recommendations in selected public health areas—testing, vaccines and therapeutics, medical supply chain, health disparities, and data. For example, we recommended that the...
title: Covid-19: Key Insights from GAO's Oversight of the Federal Public Health Response
